description: To address the issues with Windows Update on the W1022H2 Pro device, install the updates 5031224 and 5031356 in succession. After finishing the installation of 5031224, ensure that any pending multiple restarts are completed, as indicated by the Windows Update notifications. Once the October update 5031356 is fully downloaded and installed, utilize the 'restart' option within Windows Update for a smooth reboot cycle. This method minimizes downtime and ensures that system performance remains optimal post-update. Ensure to follow the prompts carefully to facilitate a single reboot for all patches, enhancing user experience by reducing additional setup time.
